rules_text:
When this artifact enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Cloud Sea Compass: Gain 2 life. Put up to three target cards from a graveyard onto the bottom of its owner’s library in a random order.
notes: 2.1.0: Bottom ability given up to so you can always gain the 2 life.
